title: The Adventures of Hatim - s01e02 - 2014 - 720p
description:
The Adventures of Hatim is an Indian action, thriller and drama TV show, which has premiered on December 28, 2013. It airs on Life OK on Saturday and Sunday evenings. The show stars Rajbeer Singh and Pooja Banerjee in lead roles.
Cast

    Rajbeer Singh as Hatim Tai
    Pooja Banerjee as Perizaad
    Chandan Anand as General Zargam of Arzaan
    Manoj Kolhatkar as Lakha the hunchback
    Dolly Sohi as Queen Shaazia of Yaman
    Pracheen Chauhan as Prince Hassan of Yaman
    Nausheen Ali Sardar as Lady Ruda
    Sachin Tyagi as Lord Hubal
    Anjali Abrol as Queen Khwahish of Ashkaar
    Khalid Siddique as King Naushwerwaan of Ashkaar
    Kishwar Merchant as vampiress Zelna
    Anang Desai as King Nomaad of Ishtiyaar
    Anil Rastogi as prisoner in Forest of Death
    Jay Thakkar as Rakhban




I do not make the rips. I download them from a website called desi-tashan.
Since I had a hard time finding this show I thought I'd make life easier for the others looking for it.  

This is essentially the process I go through.

Each episode is split into 3 parts at desitashan. I download all three parts and join them together using "Free AVI MPEG WMV MP4 FLV Video Joiner" or something else. Some of the audio in some episodes may be out of sync due to this process.

I do not work for desi-tashan, nor am I a member of their group/organization. I could not find another method of watching this that doesn't involve money. If anyone has any better option please let me know.
